entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:25 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:25 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023
